content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgCPU=avg(CPUUsagePercent_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Usage Over Time

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgFreq=avg(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Relative Frequency (%)

content.query:

uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgDisk=avg(IOPercentDiskTime_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

content.title: Disk Usage (%)

content.query:

| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgHandles=avg(HandleCount_d), AvgThreads=avg(ThreadCount_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Handles and Threads

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize AvgPaged=avg(KernelPagedMB_d), AvgNonPaged=avg(KernelNonPagedMB_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Paged vs Non-Paged Pool (MB)

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let PerfData = 
    uberAgent_System_SystemPerformanceSummary2_CL
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)  // Time range handled by parameter
    | where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
    | summarize
        ["Avg. CPU (%)"] = round(avg(CPUUsagePercent_d), 2),
        ["Avg. CPU rel. frequency (%)"] = round(avg(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent_d), 2),
        ["Avg. IOPS"] = round(avg(IOPSRead_d + IOPSWrite_d), 2),
        ["Avg. % disk time"] = round(avg(IOPercentDiskTime_d), 2),
        ["Avg. IO latency (ms)"] = round(avg(IOLatencyMsRead_d + IOLatencyMsWrite_d), 2),
        ["Avg. RAM (GB)"] = round(avg(RAMUsageGB_d), 2),
        ["Avg. RAM (%)"] = round(avg(RAMUsagePercent_d), 2),
        ["Avg. network (%)"] = round(avg(NetUtilizationPercent_d), 2),
        ["Avg. paged pool (MB)"] = round(avg(KernelPagedMB_d), 2),
        ["Avg. non-paged pool (MB)"] = round(avg(KernelNonPagedMB_d), 2),
        ["Avg. #handles"] = round(avg(HandleCount_d), 2),
        ["Avg. #threads"] = round(avg(ThreadCount_d), 2)
    by Computer;

let LatestInventory =
    uberAgent_System_MachineInventory_CL
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, HwModel_s) by Computer;

PerfData
| join kind=leftouter (LatestInventory) on Computer
| project ["Hardware model"] = HwModel_s, Computer, 
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"], ["Avg. CPU rel. frequency (%)"], ["Avg. IOPS"], ["Avg. % disk time"],
    ["Avg. IO latency (ms)"], ["Avg. RAM (GB)"], ["Avg. RAM (%)"], ["Avg. network (%)"],
    ["Avg. paged pool (MB)"], ["Avg. non-paged pool (MB)"], ["Avg. #handles"], ["Avg. #threads"]
| order by ["Avg. CPU (%)"] desc
